title: Early Top 10 RB Rankings + Ball Boys, Yeti Analysis - Fantasy Football Podcast for 4/12
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, it’s early rankings time as Andy, Mike, and Jason reveal their top 10 running backs for 2022! Which elite RBs from the 2021 fantasy football season will do it again in 2022? Plus, draft strategy and the latest NFL News! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for April 12th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(03:50) - Offensive Line Factor
(07:30) - NFL News
(16:00) - Early Top 10 RB Rankings
(16:55) - Jonathan Taylor
(20:00) - Christian McCaffrey
(24:40) - Derrick Henry
(31:15) - Austin Ekeler
(35:05) - Dalvin Cook
(37:20) - Javonte Williams
(40:50) - Alvin Kamara
(43:55) - Najee Harris
(48:05) - Joe Mixon & James Conner

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
